the data that the company provide is actually not useful and i suggest teacher can let students to make their own questionnaire and analyze
老師上課常常會需要分組 對於數據分析不擅長的人可能會比較吃力 建議期末報告可以實力平均分組 不然厲害的人都在同一組 數據分析有些人例如我比較不擅長 根本無法跟那些厲害的人比 但我願意學習 也許可以打散那些人
The final project is a little bit out of the range, anything else is great

Designing the survey ourselves might be more ideal. Not only because we can learn the techniques which is useful to our future career, but also we can collect more meaningful data to us. Working with company isn’t necessary in my opinion.

Steven is one of the most passionate professor I've met in NCCU. I'm really impressed when he said "I don't want to miss any student." The overall class design is excellent but I hope the final project instruction can be more specific. Thx!

Steven is a good teacher, willing to help students, and teaches well. But I suggest teacher can consider that it is many students' first time to learn SPSS, my classmates and I think  
the exams and final report are too difficult for us.
